contents.description: ¬°Hey üëã! I am Jorge a Spanish guy with high interest in technology, startups and businesses. In my free time I like to surf, boulder, hike or listen to podcasts.

contents.name: What am I Doing
contents.description: After closing my first Startup (meal kit company), I am focused on finding a Startup with a high technological base and a Digital product that I truly like so I can continue learning and develop my skills for the future.

contents.name: Next steps
contents.description: To continue learning about startups, technology and business opportunities which could potentially fit a market. Right now I am focused on learning how to code and improving digital products in order to achieve the best results of a digital experience. Focused on Front-end Development, Javascript and their frameworks. I will study as well backend development in order to have complete developing skills and becoming full stack.

contents.name: My dream
contents.description: I will like very much to found couple of succesful start-ups in the future. For me, building companies and products is about adding value to society and contributing towards human progress.
